#summary Creating a content type
#labels Help

Creating a new Content Type (known officially by !WordPress as [http://codex.wordpress.org/Post_Types post-types]) gives your !WordPress site CMS functionality.  The CCTM plugin allows you to create custom content types (a.k.a custom post-types) by tying into !WordPress' [http://codex.wordpress.org/Function_Reference/register_post_type register_post_type()] function.
